Agrypnos:Trowel.NAME: Trowel
Agrypnos:Trowel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Trigger the growth of a random Flower in your hand.
Agrypnos:Trowel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Trigger the growth of a Flower in your hand.

Agrypnos:Rose.NAME: Rose
Agrypnos:Rose.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Thorn to your hand for every 10 damage dealt. NL At the end of your turn, increase the damage by 4.

Agrypnos:Pesticide.NAME: Pesticide
Agrypnos:Pesticide.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to all enemies. NL Draw 1 card.

Agrypnos:BigShovel.NAME: Big Shovel
Agrypnos:BigShovel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! Seeds to your hand.
Agrypnos:BigShovel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! Upgraded Seeds to your hand.

Agrypnos:Till.NAME: Till
Agrypnos:Till.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. If the target has Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.

Agrypnos:Replanting.NAME: Replanting
Agrypnos:Replanting.DESCRIPTION: Reset the growth of a random Flower in your hand. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
Agrypnos:Replanting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reset the growth of a Flower in your hand. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Rainfall.NAME: Rainfall
Agrypnos:Rainfall.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the growth of all Flowers in your hand, draw pile, and discard pile. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:CombTheEarth.NAME: Comb The Earth
Agrypnos:CombTheEarth.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Seed to your hand and draw pile.
Agrypnos:CombTheEarth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Upgraded Seed to your hand and draw pile.

Agrypnos:MortarAndPestle.NAME: Mortar And Pestle
Agrypnos:MortarAndPestle.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Flower in your hand. Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Shell.NAME: Shell
Agrypnos:Shell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Flower in your hand.

Agrypnos:StormShelter.NAME: Storm Shelter
Agrypnos:StormShelter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. For 1 turn, Flowers cannot grow.

Agrypnos:Tumbleweed.NAME: Tumbleweed
Agrypnos:Tumbleweed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Prune.NAME: Prune
Agrypnos:Prune.DESCRIPTION: Reset the growth of a random Flower in your hand. NL Draw 2 cards.
Agrypnos:Prune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reset the growth of a Flower in your hand. NL Draw 2 cards.

Agrypnos:FloralScent.NAME: Floral Scent
Agrypnos:FloralScent.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to yourself and all enemies.
Agrypnos:FloralScent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak to yourself and !M! Weak to all enemies.

Agrypnos:Watering.NAME: Watering
Agrypnos:Watering.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the growth of all Flowers in your hand.

Agrypnos:Verdancy.NAME: Verdancy
Agrypnos:Verdancy.DESCRIPTION: Double the total growth of each Flower in your hand. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:NaturalNutrition.NAME: Natural Nutrition
Agrypnos:NaturalNutrition.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Trigger growth of all Flowers in your hand.
Agrypnos:NaturalNutrition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Trigger growth of all Flowers in your hand twice.

Agrypnos:Rot.NAME: Rot
Agrypnos:Rot.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand.
Agrypnos:Rot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

Agrypnos:Thorn.NAME: Thorn
Agrypnos:Thorn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Seed.NAME: Seed
Agrypnos:Seed.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL Upon being Exhausted, grants !B! Block and grows into a random Flower.
Agrypnos:Seed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal NL Upon being Exhausted, grants !B! Block and grows into a random Upgraded Flower.

Agrypnos:Wolfsbane.NAME: Wolfsbane
Agrypnos:Wolfsbane.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Poison applied by

Agrypnos:CorpseFlower.NAME: Corpse Flower
Agrypnos:CorpseFlower.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Apply !M! Poison to all enemies. NL When a card is Exhausted, increase the Poison applied by

Agrypnos:MorningGlory.NAME: Morning Glory
Agrypnos:MorningGlory.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of your turn, reduce damage dealt by 4.

Agrypnos:Poinsettia.NAME: Poinsettia
Agrypnos:Poinsettia.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards. Gain !B! Block for each card exhausted. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Block per card by 1.

Agrypnos:Dandelion.NAME: Dandelion
Agrypnos:Dandelion.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Gain !B! Block. NL At the end of your turn, increase Block gain by

Agrypnos:Narcissus.NAME: Narcissus
Agrypnos:Narcissus.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Choose a card. Exhaust !M! random other card(s). Add !M! identical copies of the chosen card to your hand. NL At the end of your turn, increase the number by 1. NL Exhaust.
Agrypnos:Narcissus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Choose a card. Exhaust !M! random other card(s). Add !M! identical copies of the chosen card to your hand. NL At the end of your turn, increase the number by 1.

Agrypnos:QueenOfTheNight.NAME: Queen of the Night
Agrypnos:QueenOfTheNight.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Unplayable. NL Upon taking damage, reduce it by !B! and discard this card. NL At the end of your turn, increase the reduction by

Agrypnos:Zinnia.NAME: Zinnia
Agrypnos:Zinnia.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Gain !M! Dexterity until the end of this turn. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Dexterity gain by 1. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Rue.NAME: Rue
Agrypnos:Rue.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Remove !M! random debuff(s). NL Any unused removal grants 1 Artifact instead. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Poppy.NAME: Poppy
Agrypnos:Poppy.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Gain !M! temporary health. NL At the end of your turn, increase this by 1. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Lotus.NAME: Lotus
Agrypnos:Lotus.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Unplayable. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card. NL Exhausts itself after !M! turns.
Agrypnos:Lotus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Unplayable. NL At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards. NL Exhausts itself after !M! turns.

Agrypnos:Camellia.NAME: Camellia
Agrypnos:Camellia.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal damage multiple times, starting with !D! and inflicting 1 less damage each time until reaching 0. NL At the end of your turn, increase the amount of damage by 1.

Agrypnos:Snapdragon.NAME: Snapdragon
Agrypnos:Snapdragon.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL At the end of your turn, increase the amount of damage by 1.
Agrypnos:Snapdragon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X + !M! times. NL At the end of your turn, increase the amount of damage by 1.

Agrypnos:Sunflower.NAME: Sunflower
Agrypnos:Sunflower.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Gain !M! [E]. NL At the end of your turn, increase the energy gain by 1.

Agrypnos:Myosotis.NAME: Myosotis
Agrypnos:Myosotis.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of your turn or when this card is played, increase the damage by
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: permanently. NL Does not reset when played.

Agrypnos:GhostLily.NAME: Ghost Lily
Agrypnos:GhostLily.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Ethereal. NL Upon being Exhausted, Exhaust all Flowers in your hand and add !M! Seed(s) to your hand for each card Exhausted.
Agrypnos:GhostLily.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Ethereal. NL Upon being Exhausted, Exhaust all Flowers in your hand and add !M! Upgraded Seed(s) to your hand for each card Exhausted.

Agrypnos:RoseGarden.NAME: Rose Garden
Agrypnos:RoseGarden.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you are attacked, deal 4 damage back and add a Thorn to your hand.

Agrypnos:Pollen.NAME: Pollen
Agrypnos:Pollen.DESCRIPTION: When a Flower grows, apply !M! Poison to a random enemy.

Agrypnos:Composting.NAME: Composting
Agrypnos:Composting.DESCRIPTION: Each time you Exhaust 4 cards, gain !M! Fertilizer.

Agrypnos:MorningSun.NAME: Morning Sun
Agrypnos:MorningSun.DESCRIPTION: Flowers that have not grown cost !M! less [E].

Agrypnos:SunZenith.NAME: Sun's Zenith
Agrypnos:SunZenith.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, the Flower in your hand that has grown the most times has its cost reduced by !M! until the end of the turn.
